reply.content: Please try the new update with 3d flip animation and review again. Thank you.

title: Good 💡 still needs improvement

author: David Lubnow
comment: Directions are misleading. Need to start coin flipper before you use voice commands. Directions need to be revised.

reply.content: you have to say start coin flipper. Please review again.

title: Looks good

author: Deepti Dubey
comment: It doesn't appear on the home screen

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: This is a Android Wear problem. Please reinstall the app. It could take some time until app ist availalbe on watch. Please review again.

author: Julian Stevens
comment: I'm my opinion you don't need it to say heads or tails on the screen. We can see what it is. That takes away from the coin flip experience. You want to be able to see what the outcome was. You don't have to tell us to flip again or that it was heads or tails. A tap to flip and another tap to flip again, that's it nice and simple. Take the text option off and I'll rate it a five. Or give option to have text or not from ur phone in the settings of the app.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We have updated the app with a 3d animation. Head or tail will no longer display at the end of the animation. Please update und review again. Thanks.

title: Flip it!

author: William Lee
comment: Simple app does what it says,  flips a coin on my moto 360. Works great when I'm playing board games with my kids and I need a quick tie breaker. Is there any chance for an update that allows for different coin options?

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We will add this feature in future. In the new version you get a new 3d animation. Please update and review again.

title: Fun product with my kids

comment: So ugly

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Graphics are updated in new version and a 3d animation was added. Please review again.
